translation.zh: 好嘞 伙计们 表演时间到！

translation.en: Your time. Right, let's have it, boys, yeah?

translation.en: We're here in London for the final stop of the Stereo Dream world tour.
translation.zh: 我们此刻在伦敦 参加立体声梦世界巡演的最后一站

translation.en: The fans cannot get enough of those five boys,
translation.zh: 粉丝们对这五位大男孩可谓爱不释手

translation.en: led by the edgy, the mysterious Vinnie D and the boy-next-door, Austin.

translation.en: Come on then, boys. Energy, yeah? Energy! Let's go!

立体声梦 我们爱你！

translation.en: You do live music here, yeah?
translation.zh: 你们有现场音乐表演的 对吧？
-对 偶尔会有 -来听听这个
-不错 是你写的吗还是？ -嗯

translation.en: It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.

我身上还带着合成器呢…

translation.en: -Um… -[Vinnie] I could play it live for you.
translation.zh: -呃… -我可以为你现场表演一下

translation.en: Yeah, I think we're good for now, but, um…

translation.en: How does anything get picked up if you don't wanna listen?

translation.en: -[Vinnie] It's a demo. It's a bit rough. -Yeah. No, no, I can hear that. Um…
translation.zh: -这只不过是个小样 所以还有点粗糙 -是啊 嗯嗯 我能听出来

translation.en: -[Vinnie] But you get the idea? -I absolutely do.
-Um. Yeah. -[Vinnie] Yeah, what do you think?
translation.zh: -嗯…是的 -嗯 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: It's gonna be a no from us.
It's cyclical, you know? The music scene.
translation.zh: 流行这东西是个圈 对吧？在音乐界

translation.en: So it's just… wait for it to circle back around.
translation.zh: 所以呢…等它转一圈回来就行了

translation.en: -[Vinnie] A couple of weeks? -Uh, bigger circles.
translation.zh: 过几周吗？ 呃 这圈可能要大一点

translation.en: ♪ Down in your bones ♪ ♪ Do you toss and turn… ♪
translation.zh: （《鞠躬致意》 奥斯汀罗伯茨告别巡演）

translation.en: [man] Look, the only way you'll ever end up on our radar
translation.zh: 要是你想被我们注意到的话 唯一的办法就是

translation.en: is if you have complete songs and the numbers to back it up.
translation.zh: 要有自己完整的歌曲 并且有数字做保证

translation.en: [man] Like a few hundred thousand followers on Instagram or TikTok.
translation.zh: 比如在Instagram或者抖音上 有个几十万的粉丝

translation.en: Hey, check this out. It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.

translation.en: I get that, but it's not our thing.
translation.zh: 我理解 朋友 但这不是我们的菜
好吧 什么才是你们的菜？

translation.en: Vinnie D! How far the mighty have fallen!
translation.zh: 小文D！ 真是虎落平阳啊！

translation.en: Now look at ya. Busking off Rye Lane.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你现在这样子 -跑到黑麦巷里来卖唱… -不 我不是在卖唱

translation.en: No, I'm not busking… I'm practicing.
translation.zh: -跑到黑麦巷里来卖唱… -不 我不是在卖唱 我这是在练习

translation.en: Oh, go on then, be like that then. Prick.
translation.zh: 哦 随便吧 你就这幅死相好了 混蛋

translation.en: Well, your hair looks shit anyway. You should go back to your blond boy-band look.
translation.zh: 反正你头发也像坨屎一样 还是染回你男团时候的金发吧

translation.en: Pound a bowl! Pound a bowl!
Get your tomatoes, fresh tomatoes. And your peppers!

translation.en: -[music stops] -Yo… My bro, I'm trying to practice, man.

该死的佩克汉姆啊 唉

translation.en: Yo, keep it in time, man.

translation.en: Where did you go? I was looking for you.
translation.zh: 你跑哪儿去了？我一直在找你

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to shout, but, please, I was looking for you for ages.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是故意要吼的 但请别再这样了 我找你找了好久

translation.en: I'm sorry. Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 对不起 来 我们走吧
嘿 刚才真是太棒了 哥们！

translation.en: Listen, he shouldn't be out here on his own. I'm sorry if he disturbed you.
translation.zh: 他不该一个人跑这里来的 要是他打扰到你了 对不起

translation.en: He didn't disturb me. But that was awesome.
translation.zh: 他没打扰我 不过… 刚才真的很棒

translation.en: I was walking up and down the street. I couldn't find you.
translation.zh: 我整条街都跑遍了 怎么都找不到你

translation.en: [presenter] …some amazing things up in the Lake District, didn't he?
translation.zh: …在湖区发生了一些很神奇的事情 对不对？

translation.en: We'll find out more about that on Sunday night.
translation.zh: 我们将于周日晚间做进一步报道

translation.en: [presenter 2] Now, we are delighted to welcome to the studio, the great Austin Roberts.
translation.zh: 现在 我们演播室很荣幸地 请到了伟大的奥斯汀罗伯茨

translation.en: -[presenter 2] It's great to see you. -[Austin] Thanks for having me.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你呐 奥斯汀 谢谢你们邀请我来

translation.en: [presenter 2] So this is it. You're releasing your final album
translation.zh: 那么 到此为止了 你要发行最后一张专辑了
在一段非凡的音乐生涯之后

translation.en: And of course you have the farewell tour coming up too.
translation.zh: 当然了 你还有接下来的告别巡演

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, it's been a long ride. I guess I've been very blessed.
translation.zh: 是啊 真是一段漫长的旅程 我一直以来都非常有福

translation.en: [presenter] The fans are going to be very gutted that it's the last one.
translation.zh: 这是最后一次了 粉丝们肯定会心痛欲绝的

translation.en: How do you feel about that? Are you gonna miss performing?
translation.zh: 你有怎样的感觉呢？ 你会怀念上台表演吗？

translation.en: [Austin] The fans have been good to me over the years.
translation.zh: 是啊 多年以来 粉丝们一直都对我宠爱有加

translation.en: Music has been my life, and it's given me everything.
translation.zh: 一直以来音乐就是我的生命 它带给了我一切

translation.en: [presenter] Yes, from your days with Stereo Dream to your amazing solo career.
translation.zh: 是啊 从你在立体声梦里的日子 到你单飞后的辉煌事业

translation.en: Now that you're winding down, Austin, do you have any regrets?
translation.zh: 现在你要渐渐淡出了 奥斯汀 你有什么后悔的吗？

translation.en: I definitely regret those shocking hairstyles we had in Stereo Dream.

translation.en: [presenter] Thank you so much for joining us…

translation.en: Hiya. What can I get you?
translation.zh: 你好呀 要点些什么？

translation.en: Yeah, please. Can I have a, um… cider, please?

嗯 好的 苹果酒

translation.en: D'you know, just… a half-pint will be all right, you know?

translation.en: I, um… saw you've got a new live music night starting up and…

translation.en: Not everyone gets to perform at Peckham's Finest.
translation.zh: 可不是谁都有机会 来“佩克汉姆最佳”表演的
很难被选上的 你知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I mean for me it's not really about getting to perform.

translation.en: You probably don't recognize me, but…
translation.zh: 你可能没认出我来 但…

translation.en: -I used to be… -Vinnie D. Stereo Dream.
Anyway, I'm finally working on my solo album.
translation.zh: 总之呢 我终于在创作我的单飞专辑了

translation.en: But, yeah, I just need a couple cozy, intimate venues like this

translation.en: to perform at before I go on tour.

translation.en: I… I think you made a mistake.
-I just wanted a… -It's on the house, Vinnie D.

translation.en: Vinnie D. He used to be the lead singer of Stereo Dream.

translation.en: A boy band from 20 years ago. Anyway, look…
He's got material for his solo album, which he wants to showcase here.

translation.en: [bartender] He'll bring in a whole bunch of new punters.

translation.en: Hi, Vinnie. Um, it's Mum. I know it's been a while.

translation.en: [sighs] It's Ted's birthday next week. Um…
And I'll be going to see him and I thought you might want to come.

好嘞 史蒂威 交给你了
对头 史蒂威 就这样

translation.en: Are you here for the, uh…?
-I think I'm lost, you know. -And now you are found. Come.

迪亚 没有多余的鼓了

Sit here, my friend. You are welcome.

好了 各位 我们再来一次

大家一起说：“你好 文斯”
我们说：“欢迎你 文斯”

translation.en: [Dia] We go again, and this time,
translation.zh: 我们再敲一遍 但这一次

translation.en: I want Vince to be the heartbeat.
Everyone, I want you to breathe together.

translation.en: You will feel it soon, my friend.

translation.en: Boom goes the fire and the morning sun.

translation.en: My brother, take off your jewelry.

对了 啊 一起来

♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne ♪

♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪

♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪

translation.en: Stevie? Come on, baby. Let's go.

回头见 史蒂威老弟

小文已经全都布置好了

VIP? That's a bit fancy, Ted.

瞧瞧小文给我买了什么！

translation.en: -A harmonica? Did you say thank you? -No.
Remember. Don't rush. Take your time.

-你准备好了再开始表演 -好的 小文

translation.en: [mum] Well done, Ted. Well done, Vince.

translation.en: And I see you have no musical training at all.

translation.en: No, I just always had an instinct for it.

translation.en: More of a Lennon than McCartney.

translation.en: It might help having other options.

translation.en: -About Peckham's Finest. -Do you want a drink? Because if not…

translation.en: No, I do. I do. But I need to show you something first. Check this out.

translation.en: See that? I've got an online following.

translation.en: They're all fans and they're all local. Imagine the bar take.

translation.en: Next one's in a couple of weeks.

translation.en: If you can't bring the kid, you can forget about it.

translation.en: No, he'll be there. He'll be there, I promise. All right?

他一定会来的 我保证 回见

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, you two, not bad. Not bad.

translation.en: Listen, we're finished for today. Until next week.

translation.en: -Put your stuff away, okay? Be right back. -All right.
translation.zh: -把自己东西收起来 好吗？ -好的

translation.en: Hey, Stevie, man, can I show you something?
translation.zh: 史蒂威 我能给你看样东西吗？

translation.en: Look, bro. Now check this out, man. Look.
translation.zh: 听着 兄弟 瞧瞧这个 你看

translation.en: You see? That's me. That's you.
translation.zh: 看到没？这是我 这是你

translation.en: And it's on its way to, like, 100,000 views or whatever.

translation.en: And because of this, I got us a gig at Peckham's Finest.
translation.zh: 我借着这个在“佩克汉姆最佳” 帮我们订到了一场现场表演

translation.en: If we're gonna do it, we need to practice, man.
translation.zh: 如果我们要去的话 就需要练习

translation.en: We need to rehearse, rehearse, rehearse.
translation.zh: 我们需要排练排练再排练

translation.en: I never had a gig in my entire life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子还从来没做过现场演出呢

translation.en: Yeah, this is your chance, dude.
translation.zh: 这是你的机会啊 哥们

translation.en: In front of a real audience.
Look, I was in a band once, you know?
translation.zh: 听着 我以前是乐团里的 你知道吗？

translation.en: With my experience and your drumming,
translation.zh: 我的经验加上你的打鼓技术…

translation.en: I don't like big crowds and sudden things.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢大群的人和突发状况

translation.en: Don't be scared, man. We can change that. I can help you.
translation.zh: 别害怕 这点我们可以克服的 我能帮助你的

translation.en: -Hey, have you got your own drum kit? -Yes, Vince.
translation.zh: -你有自己的架子鼓吗？ -有的 文斯
一切都好吗 史蒂威？

translation.en: Yeah, Mum. Vinnie and I are gonna do a gig.
translation.zh: 嗯 妈吗 小文跟我要去做现场表演了

translation.en: -Ignore him. -Wait, wait, wait! Let me show you this.
translation.zh: -别理他 -等等 让我给你看看这个

translation.en: ♪ Lord, won't you take my hand… ♪

translation.zh: 社区事务很重要 是吧？

translation.en: ♪ Lead me to the promised land… ♪
translation.zh: （S.前川先生 佩克汉姆法罗住宅区205号）

translation.en: Is she one of them hotline babes?
Never mind. Look, Stevie. Stevie, I need to level with you, okay?
translation.zh: 当我没说 听着 史蒂威 我需要跟你坦诚地聊一聊

translation.en: Dude, what do you want more than anything else in this entire world?
translation.zh: 哥们 在这个世界上 你最想要的东西是什么？

translation.en: Maybe I can help you with it. Come on.
translation.zh: 或许我能帮到你呢 说吧

translation.en: I want to go to music school.
Right. Listen, if we do this gig,
translation.zh: 好啊 听着 如果我们做了这场表演

translation.en: it's going to open up some real opportunities for you, man.
translation.zh: 肯定会为你带来许多好机会的

translation.en: I've got some really important people coming down.
translation.zh: 我请了些很重要的人来看
你认识奥斯汀罗伯茨吗？

translation.en: No? All right, well, he's a really big deal.
translation.zh: 不认识？好吧 他可是个大人物

translation.en: All right, and if we impress him, Stevie,
translation.zh: 好吗 要是我们能惊艳到他 史蒂威

translation.en: we might be able to go on tour.
Imagine me and you on tour together.
translation.zh: 想象一下我跟你一起去巡演
-好像要做很多场表演啊 -是啊

translation.en: [Stevie's mum] Is someone at the door?
translation.zh: 史蒂威 门口有人吗？

translation.en: Stevie, this is something I've been trying to get back for a long time.
translation.zh: 史蒂威 我一直在为这件事努力

translation.en: I really need your help with this.
How you doing? It's nice to see ya.
-What are you doing here? -I invited him for a cup of tea.
translation.zh: -你来这里做什么啊？ -我请他过来喝茶

translation.en: It's… funny… My… My brother used to do that as well.
translation.zh: 说来好笑 我弟弟以前也爱这样吃

translation.en: Couldn't wait to get to the jammy bit.

不过 他多年前就死了

translation.en: Oh God, I'm… I'm really sorry to hear that.

又不是你的错 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah? You don't dance anymore, no?
Vince is in a famous band, Mum.

translation.en: I was but… yeah. Things change.

translation.en: What famous band was that then?
Do you know, um, Stereo Dream?

translation.zh: 你以前是立体声梦里的？

translation.en: Austin Roberts is going to be at the gig when we perform.
translation.zh: 奥斯汀罗伯茨会去参加 我们的现场表演

translation.en: There's not going to be a gig, Stevie. Can you please stop mentioning that?
translation.zh: 不会有什么现场表演的 史蒂威 -你能不能别再说胡话了？ -这个嘛…其实…
-你能不能别再说胡话了？ -这个嘛…其实…

translation.en: -Well actually what? What are you doing? -I'm only trying…
translation.zh: -这个其实什么啊？你要干什么？ -我只是想…

translation.en: No, no, no, you have no idea that you're putting him in a dangerous situation.
translation.zh: 你根本不知道 你这是在把他往危险的环境里推

translation.en: Do you understand? I can't have that.
He wants to perform and… he needs an audience. He said it before.
translation.zh: 可他想要表演啊 而且… 他需要有自己的听众 他之前说过的

translation.en: -Stevie, tell her, mate. -He has no idea what that involves.
translation.zh: -史蒂威 跟她说 朋友 -他根本不知道这意味着什么

translation.en: Please don't come here and start putting ideas into his head.
translation.zh: 请别跑到这里来 往他的脑袋里塞点子

translation.en: Ideas in his… What are you talking about? This is his future.
translation.zh: 往他脑袋里塞… 你在说什么啊？这可是他的未来

translation.en: That's not for you to say.

translation.en: Um, yeah. No, of course. Yeah, I'm there. I'm there.

（立体声梦 你们是我的梦）

translation.en: [driver] Ladies and gentlemen, we've arrived at Hastings.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 我们已经到达了黑斯廷斯

translation.en: This service terminates here. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这里是终点站 谢谢

translation.en: I'm sorry that I didn't make it down.
You know how it is, innit?
translation.zh: 这种事你也明白的 对吧？

translation.en: I was thinking about that harmonica Ted used to play, remember?
translation.zh: 我一直在想泰德以前常吹的那只口琴 还记得吗？

translation.en: Think it's still up in the loft?
-It's just, I kind of wanted something… -No, I don't know.
translation.zh: -我只是…我有点想要… -不 我不知道

translation.en: Sure you don't know where it is?
translation.zh: 你真不知道它在哪里吗？

translation.en: -I told you I don't know. -I'll look myself.
Oh, you can't ambush me like this.
translation.zh: 噢 你不能这样突然出现

translation.en: I don't know where it is.
Stevie, I'm talking to you. Can you stop that, please?
translation.zh: 史蒂威 我在跟你说话呢 你停下来好吗？

translation.en: Can you talk to me, please? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 能跟我好好聊聊吗？出什么事了？

translation.en: Okay, I know he was your friend.
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道他是你朋友

translation.en: You don't need him to enjoy music, Stevie.
translation.zh: 你不需要他来享受音乐 史蒂威

translation.en: So I can go to the very good music school.
translation.zh: 这样我就能去上非常好的音乐学院了

translation.en: That's a really big deal, darling. That's a really big deal.
translation.zh: 那可是一件大事 亲爱的 一件非常大的事

translation.en: You know, I think that might be a bit much.
translation.zh: 我觉得可能有点太大了

translation.en: I think that would be a lot for anybody to take on, okay?
translation.zh: 我觉得这对任何人来说 这都是一件很艰难的事 好吗？

translation.en: They wouldn't have the care facilities you need.
translation.zh: 那里不会有你需要的医疗设施

translation.en: I don't need them. I want to be like other musicians.
translation.zh: 我不需要 我想像其他音乐家那样

translation.en: You don't need to be like anyone else.
translation.zh: 你不需要变成其他人那样

translation.en: Okay? You're perfect just as you are.
translation.zh: 好吗？你自己这样就很完美
不 我不完美 妈

translation.en: But if I study, you won't have to look after me anymore.
translation.zh: 如果我去读书的话 你就不需要再照顾我了

translation.en: So you could do other things.
I don't understand that. What…? What do you mean?
translation.zh: 我不明白 你这话什么意思？

translation.en: You stopped dancing so you could look after me.
translation.zh: 你是为了照顾我才放弃了舞蹈

translation.en: I really need you to hear this, okay?
translation.zh: 我需要你听清楚了 好吗？

translation.en: I didn't want to be part of that world anymore.
translation.zh: 是我自己不想再在那个世界里闯了
我想要的是你 好吗？

translation.en: I'm not a child. I don't need you anymore.
translation.zh: 我不是小孩子 我不需要你了

translation.en: Hey, man. What can I get for you?
translation.zh: 嘿 哥们 需要来点什么吗？

translation.en: You can get me a manager.
translation.zh: 你可以帮我找个经理来

translation.en: All right, just give me one sec.
I'm gonna have to give you this.
We're looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.zh: 我们正在找一些近距离的场地 赶在我们巡演前搞个现场表演

translation.en: I think we're probably gonna be a bit too small for you, mate.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们这里对你们来说 可能小了点 伙计

translation.en: All right, have a good night.
translation.zh: 好的 祝你有个愉快的夜晚

translation.en: I'd like to give you this.
Not much effort in that, is there?
translation.zh: 没怎么花心思啊 在设计这个上？

translation.en: We're, um, looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.zh: 我们正在找一些近距离的场地 赶在我们巡演前搞个现场表演

translation.en: I don't think this is the venue for you, lad.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们这个场地不适合你

translation.en: I recommend you take a look at that.
This is your band, is it?
translation.zh: 这是你的乐队 对吧？

translation.en: Yes it is, with my man Vinnie D, called The Tin Men.
translation.zh: 没错 我和我哥们小文D 名字叫铁皮人

translation.en: Yeah, like I said, we're not really booking at the minute.
translation.zh: 就像我刚才说的 我们目前没有办这个的计划

translation.en: You know what? Give me your details and I'll see what I can do.
translation.zh: 要不这样 仔细跟我说说 我看看有什么办法
我替我们订到了场演出

translation.en: Slow down, man. What are you talking about?
The place is called Bar Star, and the manager's called Marnie.
translation.zh: 场地叫做星酒吧 经理叫玛妮

translation.en: Bro, I'm sorry for what happened.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉发生了这种事

translation.en: I'm sorry for your mum as well, but…
translation.zh: 我也很对不起你妈 但…

translation.en: She don't want me hanging around you no more, and
translation.zh: 她不想让我再出现再你身边了

translation.en: to be honest, I can see why.
translation.zh: 老实说 我理解为什么

translation.en: If you come to the music group, you can say sorry to her face.
translation.zh: 如果你来参加音乐小组的话 你可以当着她的面对她道歉

translation.en: -Stevie, mate… -Anyway, see you on Thursday. Bye. -No, no, no… -[line clicks]
translation.zh: -史蒂威 伙计… 不… -那么我们周四见 再见

translation.en: Vince, please, just leave us alone, all right?
translation.zh: 文斯 拜托了 别来烦我们 好吗？

translation.en: Why are you lurking around in the car park?
translation.zh: 你干嘛在停车场里鬼鬼祟祟的啊？

translation.en: I'm not some kind of sex offender.
translation.zh: 我又不是什么性犯罪者

translation.en: I came to say sorry. That's all.
translation.zh: 我是来道歉的 仅此而已

translation.en: Yeah, he's apologizing. He's not a sex offender.
translation.zh: 是啊 他来道歉的 他不是性犯罪者

translation.en: You know he put you in danger. You do get that, right?
translation.zh: 你明白他会让你陷入危险的 这点你明白的 对吧？

translation.en: He didn't mean to do what he did.
translation.zh: 他不是故意要那么做的

translation.en: I think you should hear him out.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该听他说完
好 说吧 怎么了？

translation.en: Both of you, I'm… I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 对你俩都… 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: I made it into a dangerous situation.
translation.zh: 是我把情况变得更危险了

translation.en: Mum, he was trying to protect me.
translation.zh: 妈 他只是想要保护我

translation.en: [Dia in distance] Okay. Okay, we are ready to start.
translation.zh: 好了 我们准备开始了

translation.en: Come on. I think the class is starting.
translation.zh: 来吧 好像要开始上课了
今天呐… 啊 史蒂威！
加入我们 文森特 好久不见

translation.en: Take a seat. Quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick.
Today, we are going to start with some singing.
translation.zh: 今天 我们要从唱歌开始

translation.en: Who wants to be the heartbeat today?
Vincent, you should be leader today.
translation.zh: 文森特 今天应该让你来做领头人
帮我们找到自己的心跳

translation.en: No. Trust me, you don't want me doing that, man.
translation.zh: 不 相信我 你不会想要我这么做的

translation.en: Who wants Vincent to be leader?
translation.zh: 谁想让文森特来做领头人？

translation.en: -Do we want Vincent to be leader? -[all] Yes, Dia.
translation.zh: -我们想让文森特来当领头人吗？ -想 迪亚
啊哈 团体已经发声了

translation.en: You want me to find the heartbeat?
You can't live without a heartbeat, can you?
translation.zh: 没有心跳人是没发活的 对吧？

translation.en: Except this guy. Am I right?
translation.zh: 除了这家伙 我说的对吧？

translation.en: Who's going to sing first then?
translation.zh: 那么 由谁先开口唱呢？

translation.en: I know you've got a beautiful song in there waiting to come out.
translation.zh: 我知道你有一首动听的歌 正等着唱出来呢

translation.en: Go on, just… take your time.

translation.zh: 等你准备好了 好吗？

translation.en: I'm going to have to serenade you and we don't want that, do we?
translation.zh: 就得让我来为你们唱情歌了 那样大家都不想 对吧？

translation.en: She never sang like that for me, you know?
translation.zh: 她从没像那样为我唱过歌 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm looking for someone to take over for me here.
translation.zh: 我在找人接替我在这里的位置

translation.en: I want to put your name forward.
translation.zh: 我想要把你的名字递上去

translation.en: -Me, teaching? -My brother, when you got it, you got it.
translation.zh: -我？布道？ -我的兄弟 这种事情是天生的

translation.en: But when you are good, you can help a lot of people.
translation.zh: 但如果你教得好的话 可以帮到很多人

translation.en: The joy that comes from teaching through music
translation.zh: 通过音乐来布道获得的喜乐

translation.en: is better than any money or success.
translation.zh: 比任何的金钱和成功都要好
嘿 你今天表现得很好

translation.en: You've been busy. Hopefully we'll hear back from one of these soon.
translation.zh: 你最近挺忙的啊 希望我们很快就能收到回音

translation.en: I kind of had a… offer as well, actually.
translation.zh: 其实已经有人…给了我一份

translation.en: Do you know anything about music therapy?

translation.zh: 嘿 兄弟 我是奥斯汀

translation.en: I'm sorry about what happened last time.
Ah, don't be silly, man. It's fine.
translation.zh: 啊 别说傻话了 没事的

translation.en: To be honest, you had a point.
translation.zh: 说实话 你说得有道理

translation.en: I could've stepped up for you more back when, uh…
translation.zh: 我本可以站出来多支持你的 那时候…

translation.en: Anyway, I just got shown a video
translation.zh: 不说这个了 有人给我看了个视频

translation.en: of you and your drummer performing at The George.
translation.zh: 你和你的鼓手在乔治酒馆的表演

translation.en: The sound is really great, man.

translation.zh: 多谢 哥们 基本上是这样的 不敢保证啊 因为我必须先争得丹的同意 但是…

translation.en: No promises because I gotta run it by Den, but…
translation.zh: 基本上是这样的 不敢保证啊 因为我必须先争得丹的同意 但是…

translation.en: you're in the mix to take the supporting slot on my tour.
translation.zh: 你们也在我巡演的助演备选名单上
如果你不介意帮我助演的话

translation.en: Would you be free to come down to the studio on Friday for a chat?
translation.zh: 这周五你有空来录音室聊一聊吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let me just, uh, check the old schedule.
translation.zh: 嗯 让我看一看我的日程表

translation.en: I think I can make that.
-All right. Brilliant. -All right. See you then, mate.
translation.zh: -好嘞 太棒了 -到时候见 伙计

translation.en: Are we playing Bar Star first?
translation.zh: 我们要先去星酒吧演出吗？

translation.en: No, man. No, we're going on tour, I want to write something new.
translation.zh: 不 我们要去巡演了 我想写点新东西

translation.en: You know, a month ago I couldn't even finish off a verse.
translation.zh: 一个月前 我连一小节歌词都没写完
现在我们已经是铁皮人了

translation.en: Hey, we need to get your mum on our side, though.
translation.zh: 不过我们需要得到你妈的支持

translation.en: All right, I'll speak to her.
translation.zh: 好的 我会跟她谈的

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Dave, you gave me a chance, right?
translation.zh: 不 戴夫 你给过我一次机会 对吧？

translation.en: And I blew it. I'm sorry. I apologize.
translation.zh: 是我搞砸了 对不起 我道歉

translation.en: Okay, give me 15 seconds and I'll be out of here.
translation.zh: 给我15秒 我就离开这里

translation.en: Do you wanna go for a drink with me?
translation.zh: 你愿意跟我去喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Not here. Not here. Okay, somewhere else. Somewhere nicer.
translation.zh: 不是在这里 好吗 去别的地方 高级点的地方
好的 我会联系你的 好吗

translation.en: All right. Dave, it's been emotional.
translation.zh: 戴夫 聊得挺激动的

translation.en: [Vinnie] Everything's so small from up here, innit?
translation.zh: 从这儿看下去 一切都好小啊 是吧

translation.en: Hey. Great to see you again, Vinnie.
translation.zh: 嘿 再见到你真好 小文

translation.en: -When was the last time we…? -Uh, Smash Hits Awards.
Fuck me, was it as long as that?

translation.zh: 你看起来很棒啊 嘿

translation.en: Listen, we want this tour to be huge. Yeah, we need a support act that
translation.zh: 听着 我们想让这次的巡演大获成功 所以我们需要一个…

translation.en: has some real meaning to the fans.
translation.zh: 对粉丝来说很有意义的助演

translation.en: I want you to support me on my final tour.
translation.zh: 我想让你为我最后的巡演助演

translation.en: Maybe at the end of your set, I could come on stage and join you?
translation.zh: 或许在你表演快结束时 我可以上台来加入你？

translation.en: We could do one of the old hits.
translation.zh: 我们一起唱首经典曲目

translation.en: I kind of need him 'cause we're The Tin Men, innit?
translation.zh: 我需要他 因为我们现在是“铁皮人”了 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I get it. He's a talent but, um…
translation.zh: 嗯 我理解 他是个人才 但…

translation.en: Listen, we all know what happened at that pub.
translation.zh: 我们都知道在那个酒吧发生了什么

translation.en: You can't be running that kind of risk, Vince.
translation.zh: 可不能冒这种风险啊 文斯

translation.en: You can't have a special needs kid
translation.zh: 不能带着个有特殊需求的孩子去

translation.en: with zero experience going out drumming on the tour.
translation.zh: 他根本毫无经验 怎么可能带去巡演上打鼓呢

translation.en: I think he'd be all right if he had a bit of support.
translation.zh: 我觉得他会没事的 只要给他一点支持就行

translation.en: [Dennis] All I'm saying is this is about you.
translation.zh: 我只是想说 这里的重点是你

translation.en: I've got drummers ten times his caliber, you know?
translation.zh: 我手上有强他十倍的鼓手 你知道吗？

translation.en: Ones that can handle the crowds.
translation.zh: 能应对得了人群的那种

translation.en: You're going to be playing these songs to a massive audience.
translation.zh: 你将会在大量的观众面前 表演这些歌曲

translation.en: And we all know you've got unfinished business up on that stage.
translation.zh: 我们都知道你在舞台上还有未尽之事

translation.en: You might even get an album off the back of it.
translation.zh: 演完了你说不定还有机会出专辑呢

translation.en: Don't tell me you don't want that, Vince.
translation.zh: 别告诉我这你也不想要 文斯

translation.en: No, of course I do. Of course.
translation.zh: 不 我当然想 当然了

translation.en: Stevie. I had a meeting with Austin and his manager Dennis yesterday.
translation.zh: 史蒂威 我昨天跟奥斯汀 还有他的经纪人丹尼斯见了面
史蒂威 他们要求我…

translation.en: They asked me to do the tour by myself.
translation.zh: 他们要求我自己一个人去巡演

translation.en: They just weren't up for it.
I think 'cause me and Austin have got a history,
translation.zh: 我想是因为奥斯汀跟我有渊源

translation.en: that's the only reason they want me to go without you.
translation.zh: 这是唯一的理由 他们想让我去 不带上你

translation.en: I really thought they were going to take a punt on us, mate. I really did.
translation.zh: 我原本真以为 他们会在我们身上赌一把的

translation.en: You only get one shot, and that's if you're lucky.
translation.zh: 你就只有一次机会 而且是运气好的话

translation.en: It's a very great opportunity for you.
translation.zh: 这对你来说确实是个非常棒的机会

translation.en: Yeah but, I don't know if I'm going to do it yet.
translation.zh: 是啊 但我也不知道我会不会去
我还没决定 我只是…

translation.en: I said to them I'd think about it.
translation.zh: 我跟他们说我会考虑一下的

translation.en: If you have a second shot, then you really have to take it.
translation.zh: 如果你得到了第二次机会 那你就真得抓住它

translation.en: There will never be a third shot.
translation.zh: 绝对不可能有第三次机会的

translation.en: That's wicked, man. What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 那太棒了 打算怎么庆祝啊？

translation.en: I'm going to go to a restaurant for something to eat with my mum
translation.zh: 我要去餐厅里 跟我妈一起吃个饭

translation.en: Yeah, man. Yeah, I'd love that.
You going? I'll see you later, Stevie, yeah?
translation.zh: 你要走了？ 我们回头见 斯蒂威 好吗？
出什么事了 史蒂威？

translation.en: Okay, my friends. Let's start. Are we ready?
translation.zh: 好嘞 我的朋友们 我们开始吧 大家准备好了吗？
史蒂威去哪儿了？文斯人呢？

translation.en: You know, I saw Nadeera's mum today.
translation.zh: 我今天见到了纳迪拉的妈妈

translation.en: Everybody misses you at music group, she says.
translation.zh: 她说音乐小组里的每个人都很想你

translation.en: You know, I still don't understand why you're not going.
translation.zh: 我还是不明白 你是为什么不去

translation.en: Nah… It's not the same anymore.
translation.zh: 不 跟以前不一样了

translation.en: ♪ But how do I know What you're thinking? ♪
Sure you don't want me to come with you?
translation.zh: 确定不想让我跟你一起去吗？

translation.en: -Definitely don't need your sticks? -No, I'm all right. Thank you.
translation.zh: -也确定不要你的棍子？ -不 不用了

translation.en: I can do this on my own.
Just have fun. Have a great day, and I'll see you at home.
translation.zh: 好好玩一玩 愉快地过一天 我们家里见

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Just… turn around. Okay. Go.
translation.zh: 嗯 好的 转过来 好了 去吧

translation.en: [woman] This is our state-of-the-art percussion department.
translation.zh: 这是我们最先进的打击乐部

translation.en: [woman] This is our world-class concert hall,
translation.zh: 这是我们世界级的音乐厅

translation.en: which has played host to some of the finest musicians in the world.
translation.zh: 世界上最优秀的音乐家在这里演奏过

translation.en: -Did Jack DeJohnette play here? -[woman] That's correct.
translation.zh: -杰克德约翰内特在这里演出过吗？ -没错

translation.en: Yeah. You know, he's going to need some time, I think.
translation.zh: 嗯 你知道的 我想他会需要一些时间

translation.en: Yeah. It was a… a bombshell for both of us.
translation.zh: 是啊 这对我俩来说… 都挺出乎意料的

translation.en: Oh yeah? Going on tour with Austin Roberts.
translation.zh: 是吗？跟奥斯汀罗伯茨一起巡演

translation.en: I wanted it to be with Stevie.
translation.zh: 我想跟史蒂威一起去的

translation.en: You must be relieved it's all over now though, hey?
translation.zh: 你肯定松了一口气吧 现在这一切都结束了？

translation.en: Come on, now. I know you've always hated me.
translation.zh: 少来 我知道你一直很恨我

translation.en: You have managed to bring out something in him
translation.zh: 你成功地挖掘出了他内心的一些东西

translation.en: that no one else has been able to do.
translation.zh: 从来没有其他人做到过

translation.en: I saw how much you meant to him.
translation.zh: 我能看出你对他来说有多重要

translation.en: Why do you think I agreed to the gig?
translation.zh: 你觉得我为什么会同意 让你们去演出？

translation.en: Because I saw how bloody brilliant The Tin Men were.
translation.zh: 因为我看到了铁皮人有多棒

translation.en: You know, these days I look at Stevie
translation.zh: 你知道吗 如今我看着史蒂威

translation.en: and I see these flashes of the man he could be.
translation.zh: 我的眼前会闪过 他将来有可能成为的那个男子汉

translation.en: He was sort of stuck, you know.
and watch his head get filled with empty promises. I can't do that.
translation.zh: 看着他的脑袋被空洞的承诺灌满 我做不到

translation.en: He was never in it to make a name for himself, Vince.
translation.zh: 他这么做 从来不是为了让自己出名 文斯

translation.en: All he ever wanted was a friend.
translation.zh: 他只不过想要一个朋友

translation.en: Should have been both of us.
It's Vince Denham on tour and…
translation.zh: 现在去巡演的是文斯德纳姆 但…

translation.en: -[Amber] Don't say that. -No, I shouldn't do it.
translation.zh: -别说这种话 -不 我不应该去

translation.en: [Amber] Vince, you've wanted this for so long.
translation.zh: 文斯 这个机会你想要了这么久

translation.en: But I need you out of his life.
translation.zh: 但我需要你从他的生活中消失

translation.en: What about his birthday? He asked me if I…
translation.zh: 那他的生日呢？ 他问我会不会…

translation.en: I hope this goes well for you. I really do.
translation.zh: 我希望你这回能顺顺利利的 我衷心希望

translation.en: But I've got to draw the line here.
translation.zh: 但我必须把界限划在这儿了

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
translation.zh: 你明白我在说什么的 对吧？

translation.en: He needs to find his own path now.
translation.zh: 现在他需要找到自己的路

translation.en: Vinnie, I'll introduce you to Jay and Ryan.
translation.zh: 小文 我来给你介绍一下杰伊和瑞安

translation.en: Jay's, uh, producing, and they've been playing around with your tracks
translation.zh: 杰伊正在制作 他们一直在摆弄你的歌

translation.en: and coming up with some good ideas.
I think, you know, making it a little bit more, uh, palatable,
translation.zh: 让这首歌更加…怎么说呢… 入耳一点…

translation.en: and we ripped the track from a couple of the clips you sent over.
translation.zh: 我们从你之前发过来的几个片段中 把这首歌拼了出来

translation.en: -So it sounds a bit rough. -Yeah, he'll get it. Just play it.
translation.zh: -所以听起来有点粗糙 -嗯 他明白的 快播放吧

translation.en: It's a bit more current, yeah? Yeah.
translation.zh: 这样更流行一点 对吧？

translation.en: ♪ There's a miracle outside my window… ♪
translation.zh: 有一个奇迹 在我的窗口

translation.en: Do you reckon we could, uh, dial back the reverb a little bit?
translation.zh: 你觉得把混响调低一点点 会不会更好？

translation.en: Kind of sounds like I'm in a cathedral or something.
translation.zh: 听起来像是我在大教堂里唱歌似的

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, we can talk about all this, but this is the right sound.
translation.zh: 好的 这些我们可以再聊 但这种风格是对的

translation.en: This is really good, yeah? Okay.
translation.zh: 这样非常好 是吧？好的

translation.en: Guys, uh, I just need to be with Vinnie, uh, for a few moments.
translation.zh: 各位 我需要跟小文独处一会儿

translation.en: If you could just, uh, leave us, that would be great.
Just gonna leave this with you.
You want me to sign this now?
It's… standard terms. You take your time.
translation.zh: 都是… 标准条款 你慢慢来

translation.en: When you've signed it just come and join me and Austin out there, yeah?
translation.zh: 你签好后就来找我和奥斯汀吧

translation.en: We might change our minds about you.
translation.zh: 我们说不定会改主意的
祝你生日快乐 亲爱的史蒂威

translation.en: Go on. Let me see it one more time.
translation.zh: 来嘛 再让我看一此吧

translation.en: Maybe we should frame it. Mm.
translation.zh: 要不我们把它裱起来吧
这真是太棒了 宝贝
只是要去独奏一场而已

translation.en: Well, I'm bloody proud of you, whether you get in or not.
translation.zh: 反正我已经很为你骄傲了 无论你能不能考上
生日快乐 我帅气的男子汉

translation.en: Come on then. Don't be shy.
[Amber] Um, hi? What the hell is going on?
translation.zh: 呃 嗨？到底怎么回事？

translation.en: Um, I just wanted to do this just to…
What I'm trying to say is, I think you're banging, man.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 我觉得你很屌 哥们

translation.en: Proper. Not in a weird way, but, like…
translation.zh: 真的 没什么奇怪的意思 但那个…

translation.en: ♪ When the sun set on me ♪
translation.zh: 当太阳 对我落了山

translation.en: ♪ I'm not too proud to admit ♪
Hey, come on Stevie! We got an empty seat up here, bruv!
translation.zh: 嘿 来吧 史蒂威！ 上面这儿的位置还空着呢 老弟！

translation.en: ♪ Feel the change I feel the change ♪
♪ Feel the change! Feel the change! ♪
